## extractAppStableResolve() function

Method used for extraction of resolve method for promise

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function extractAppStableResolve(appStablePromise: Promise<void>): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  appStablePromise | <code>Promise&lt;void&gt;</code> | Promise which contains resolve method that is going to be extracted |

<b>Returns:</b>

`() => void`
